cn transfer OBJECT* to STORE*
cn transfer HASH* from STORE to STORE*

Copies a tree from one store to another.

cn transfer HASH* to STORE*

As above, but uses the selected store as source store.

cn leniently transfer …

Warns about missing objects, but ignores them and proceeds with the rest.

cn thoroughly transfer …

Check subtrees of objects existing at the destination. This may be used to fix missing objects on the destination store.

Syntax

Open
